thread.title: Myriad Supply is the First Ruckus Wireless Alpha Dog Partner in the Northeast
thread.title_full: Myriad Supply is the First Ruckus Wireless Alpha Dog Partner in the Northeast

title: Myriad Supply is the First Ruckus Wireless Alpha Dog Partner in the Northeast
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Myriad Supply is the First Ruckus Wireless Alpha Dog Partner in the Northeast Ruckus Wireless recognizes Myriad Supply as the first Alpha Dog in the Northeast for proven expertise in Ruckus Wireless Wi-Fi technology solutions. NEW YORK, NY, September 04,   Myriad Supply announced that it has become the first Alpha Dog partner in the Northeast with Ruckus Wireless. This achievement sets Myriad Supply apart from other partners in the Northeast and demonstrates their success in becoming an expert in Ruckus Wireless Wi-Fi technology solutions. Ruckus Wireless is a pioneer in the wireless infrastructure market, enabling carriers and enterprises to stay ahead of the exploding demand for high-bandwidth applications and services. The Alpha Dog partner status was introduced in 2014 as the top tier of Ruckus Wireless' Big Dogs partner program. As an Alpha Dog level partner, Myriad Supply has proven that they are a tenacious leader in   Ruckus' Smart Wi-Fi technology solutions. The sales and engineering teams at Myriad Supply were required to complete accredited training upon review of becoming an Alpha Dog partner. The technical courses touched on Ruckus BeamFlex technology, standalone wireless access points, ZoneDirector Controllers, Ruckus Smart Positioning Technology, as well as various vertical solutions and services, distinguishing Myriad Supply's team as individuals with the strongest understanding of Ruckus technology concepts, design and deployment practices. "We are proud to have become a member of the Alpha Dog top tier with Ruckus. The hard work our team put into achieving this top honor demonstrates our commitment to delivering high-level expertise to our clients," commented Andrew Fisher, Founder and CEO, Myriad Supply. Alpha Dog membership recognizes Myriad Supply's valuable technical knowledge and ensures the highest quality client outcomes. Myriad is committed to having top-notch sales and technical resources who have taken advantage of the training and certification offered by Ruckus. The Alpha Dog partnership program gives Myriad Supply access to the world-class Ruckus' WatchDog enterprise support programs. These support programs give Myriad Supply the ability to design customized support programs to best suit each client's needs.About Myriad Supply Myriad Supply, founded in 2003, is a widely recognized solution provider, delivering best-of-breed hardware in networking, data storage, Wi-Fi, VoIP, information security, and cloud solutions. Myriad serves over 10,000 customers and has a _99% customer retention rate.   call Myriad Supply at (866) 725-1025, or write info@myriadsupply.com. # # #
